nodes.text: The Gallo Mountains was a mountain chain that was located on the world of Naboo. The settlement of Dee'ja Peak was situated upon the summit of a mountain within this chain. The Summit Farm Blossom Winery was also located in the mountains.
The indigenous species of Naboo, the Gungans, revered a Sacred Place in the swampy foothills of the Gallo Mountains.
Circa 1 ABY, the criminals known as the Darkwalkers shot down a shuttle in order to steal a bio-scanner. The shuttle crashed in the mountains and the Darkwalkers plundered the wreckage.
